parameters.content:
## Overall Description

This n8n workflow fully automates the process of creating and publishing professional LinkedIn posts based on real-world experience in AI automation and workflow engineering, enriched with latest industry insights from the internet, and paired with a relevant high-quality image.

## Workflow Logic (High-Level)

- Trigger workflow manually
- Define posting context (your expertise)
- Fetch latest AI/automation trends from the web
- Filter insights relevant to your field
- Generate a LinkedIn-ready post using AI
- Generate a professional image related to the post
- Validate image and text quality
- Merge approved text + image
- Convert content into LinkedIn format
- Publish post on LinkedIn
- Send email notification on success or failure

## Credentials

1. OpenAI API (GPT & DALLe-3) or HuggingFace Key (Free)
2. LinkedIn API Key
3. SMTP ClientId

## Context and Relevant Insights

Set the trigger based on your time period to post (daily, weekly or custom date)

Defines your professional identity and posting scope
Set Fields:- AI automation, n8n workflow, backend/frontend systems.

Get Latest topic from medium or relevant sources.
Search with your parameter that defines only what matters to your field.

## Generate LinkedIn Post

Generate human friendly professional LinkedIn post by combining real world experience with current industry insights

## Generate Image for Post

Creates a professional, LinkedIn-ready image using OpenAI API that visually represents AI automation, workflows, and scalable systems.

set the prompt based on your post topic.

Binary format that Converts the generated image into binary format required for publishing image posts on LinkedIn.

Check Image Condition (IF Node)

Validates the generated image by checking its availability, format, and readiness before posting.

## Merge Both Results

Combines the approved LinkedIn post text and the validated image into a single item for LinkedIn posting.

## Check Post Result (IF Node)

Verifies whether the LinkedIn post was successfully published

Send Alert Email

Sends an automated email notification confirming successful posting or alerting in case of failure.
